import {useContext} from 'react' import Modal from '../UI/Modal/Modal' import classes from './Cart.module.' import CartContext from '../../store/cart-context' const Cart = props=>{ const cartCtx= useContext(CartContext) const totalAmount = `cartCtx.totalAmount.toFixed(2)` const cartItems=
    {cartCtx.items.map((item)=>(
  • {item.name}
    • ))}
return {cartItems}
Total Amount 367.34
} export default Cart
